New Records: David Warner needs nine fours to complete 700 fours in ODIs
Hasan Ali is two scalps away from completing the milestone of 100 ODI wickets
Steven Smith is one big hit away from reaching 50 maximums in ODIs
Adam Zampa requires just three scalps to get to 150 wickets in one-day internationals
Mohammad Rizwan is 59 runs short of reaching the landmark of 2000 runs in ODI cricket
Babar Azam is three grabs away from completing 50 catches in ODIs
Warner requires nine fours to reach 2000 fours in international cricket
Glenn Maxwell needs seven sixes to complete 250 maximums across formats
Babar requires four fours to get to 500 fours in the 50-overs format
Marcus Stoinis is four big hits away from reaching 50 maximums in international matches
Pre-Game Insights: Pat Cummins and his men will look to register their second successive win by getting over the line against Pakistan in what promises to be an exciting encounter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Aussies have a good record of six wins in ten outings against Pakistan in World Cups which also includes the grand 1999 final at Lords
Others: The iconic venue is all set to host its first game of the current WC campaign
The Aussies have dominated the Asian giants as they have won 69 ODIs out of the 107 played between the two countries
